articles.title: U.S. Warmongers' Ill-boding Military Moves Flayed
articles.content:
U.S. Warmongers' Ill-boding Military Moves Flayed
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Some days ago the U.S. forces in south Korea staged frantic air firing exercises with the mobilization of Apache helicopters in their firing range in the city of Phochon, Kyonggi Province. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in a signed commentary brands these reckless moves as the criminal acts of leading the situation on the Korean Peninsula, which is inching close to the brink of a war, to the extremity, adding that the DPRK can not but take a serious view of such moves. 
					
					 A touch-and-go situation is prevailing in Korea because the south Korean puppets waged reckless confrontational moves for a war, obsessed with a wild ambition to invade the DPRK, it observes.
					
					 What is problem is that the U.S. bellicose forces are supporting the puppets by waging saber-rattling against the DPRK from the outset of the new year, the commentary says.
					
					 It admits of no argument that such moves are provocative acts of harassing peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula the situation of which is already instable, and increasing the danger of a nuclear war to extremity, the commentary says, and continues:
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggressor troops in south Korea staged madcap drills for a war together with puppets of the south Korean army almost every day recently at a time when the U.S. warmongers let loose a spate of reckless remarks calling for the "use of military power" against the DPRK. These exercises are a preliminary war to examine and round off the performing capability of the already mapped-out war scenario targeted against the DPRK without an exception.  These are nothing but a revelation of military attempt aimed at mounting a preemptive attack on the DPRK any time. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' preparatory moves for launching a new war only compel the people of the DPRK to sharpen revolutionary vigilance against them and bolster a powerful deterrent capable of coping with them. 
					
					 The people of the DPRK want peace but are never afraid of a war. If the U.S. bellicose forces seek to ignite a war at any cost the army and people of the DPRK will deal a deadly blow at the aggressors by giving full play to the strength and mental power they have built up by dint of Songun.
					
					 The U.S. war-like forces should clearly understand the will of the people of the DPRK and stop their reckless military frenzy.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Redress Its Past
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Redress Its Past
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- To make Japan liquidate its past is the work to correct history and achieve peace and prosperity in Asia and the rest of the world. 
					 Rodong Sinmun today observes this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Though many years have passed since the defeat of the Japanese imperialists, the wound of history in the last century which underwent hardships subject to the high-handed practices and violence by the Japanese imperialists remains unhealed and the grudge of the victims against them has grown bitterer.
					
					 The war of aggression and hideous human rights abuses committed by Japan in the past are being openly negated, distorted and whitewashed, and nationalism and militarism are being instilled into the rising generations in Japan. Japan has steadily perfected the legal and institutional mechanism as a war state. It should no longer be allowed to evade the settlement of its past, become a military giant and launch overseas expansion. The prevailing situation calls for waging vigorous movement to reveal the truth about Japan’s hideous human rights abuses and force it to redeem them in an international scale.
					
					 To the end, it is necessary, among other things, to escalate the struggle for demanding the Japanese government completely open to the pubic all the documents and data related to the past crimes committed by Japan. It is also necessary to disclose the truths about Japan’s hideous human rights abuses by employing every possible channel and way.
					
					 What is particularly necessary here is for world broad human rights and peace-defending bodies and others to conduct in a big way various activities such as building up public opinion to force Japan to liquidate its past on the international arenas including the UN in firm solidarity and an international signature campaign while waging unrelenting struggle until Japan redresses its past.
					
					 The ranks of the international solidarity council demanding the settlement of Japan’s past should be increased and its function and role be enhanced.
					
					 The peace-loving people in Asia and the rest of the world should achieve firm unity and escalate the struggle to demand Japan redress its past.

articles.title: Flunkeyism and Dependence upon Foreign Forces Rebuffed
articles.content:
Flunkeyism and Dependence upon Foreign Forces Rebuffed
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Whoever truly wishes national reunification should reject flunkeyism and the moves of depending upon foreign forces no matter where he lives and what he does.
					Rodong Sinmun today observes this in a signed article.
					
					The independent national reunification would be unthinkable apart from the struggle against flunkeyism and the moves of depending upon foreign forces, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The present conservative ruling forces in south Korea are blatantly challenging the trend of the June 15 era of reunification and running amuck with the moves to provoke a war against the north in collusion with foreign forces by adopting the anti-reunification confrontational ideas the keynote of which is watchwords "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars" as their policy while trampling upon the idea of "By our nation itself" clarified in the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration. This is an expression of flunkeyism and dependence upon foreign forces.
					
					 The reality urgently requires to resolutely struggle against flunkeyism and dependence upon foreign forces and aggression and intervention by them in order to defend the sovereignty and the dignity of the nation and realize the national reunification according to the will and the interests of the nation.
					
					 As a man is more dead than alive if he has no independence, a nation can not struggle against flunkeyism and the moves of depending upon foreign forces which do harm to the nation if it fails to hold fast to independence. Such a nation will, in the end, fall short of getting rid of domination, subjugation and oppression by foreign forces and traitors.
					
					 Genuine patriotism lies in the struggle to defend the independence of the country and the nation and achieve the national reunification.
					
					 The group of Lee Myung Bak in south Korea is an intermediary of flunkeyism and the idea of dependence upon foreign forces and a group of die-hard stooges serving foreign forces. If the group of traitors is allowed to encroach upon the interests of the nation in collusion with the imperialists with their backs turned on the country and the nation, it would be impossible to check aggression and intervention by foreign forces and achieve the national reunification.
					
					 When all the Koreans in the north and the south and overseas resolutely reject flunkeyism and the idea of depending upon foreign forces and have firm stand of national independence and patriotism can they frustrate the moves of foreign forces and the sycophantic traitors against the nation and reunification and bring about an epoch-making phase in the nation-wide struggle to achieve the national reunification.

articles.title: Removal of "Enemy-Benefiting" Label Attached to Hanchong Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Removal of "Enemy-Benefiting" Label Attached to Hanchong Called for in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The Action Headquarters of the 17th-term south Korean Federation of University Student Councils made public a statement entitled "We bitterly denounce the court decision to define the south Korean Council of Youth Organizations (Hanchong) as an enemy-benefiting organization" on Feb. 4.
					 The statement accused the Supreme Court of making a decision to define Hanchong as an "enemy-benefiting organization" on January 30 at last, adding that it is a clear indication showing to what phase the Lee Myung Bak regime's suppression under the pretext of "security" has reached.
					
					 Saying that Hanchong has conducted various activities to contribute to achieving reunification, the desire of the Koreans, and to the settlement of the issue of the youth unemployment, etc, the statement deplored that the Lee dictatorial regime, however, attached the "enemy-benefiting" label to it branding its activities as "dangerous ones", an act which can be done only by the Lee dictatorial regime.
					
					The youth and students will never pardon the suppression aimed at restricting the activities of progressive organizations, the statement noted, demanding the Lee regime remove the "enemy-benefiting" label unreasonably attached to Hanchong and step down at once.

articles.title: New Year Friendship Meeting between Korean and Japanese Sportspersons Held
articles.content:
New Year Friendship Meeting between Korean and Japanese Sportspersons Held
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- A new year friendship meeting for 2009 between Korean and Japanese sportspersons was held in Tokyo on Feb. 6.
					 Present there were Nam Sung U and Pae Ik Ju, vice-chairmen of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), and other leading officials of Chongryon and the Korean Amateur Athletic Federation in Japan and Korean sportspersons in Japan.
					
					 On hand were the representatives of the Olympic Committee and sports organizations of different events in Japan and members of the International Olympic Committee and others concerned.
					
					 Speaking at the meeting, Kim Ro Hyon, chairman of the Korean Amateur Athletic Federation in Japan, noted that last year the Korean sportspersons in Japan proved successful at games.
					
					 Recalling that the Japanese authorities have barred the DPRK players from participating in international games held in Japan in recent years, pursuant to the hostile policy toward the DPRK, he said: Such unreasonable steps should be rectified immediately.
					
					 The chairman of the Olympic Committee of Japan, speaking next, expressed his determination to continue making efforts to boost the Japan-DPRK friendship through sports activities.

articles.title: Bulletin to Commemorate February 16 Issued in South Africa
articles.content:
Bulletin to Commemorate February 16 Issued in South Africa
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party and the South African Association of Friendship and Solidarity with Korean People jointly released a special bulletin "General Kim Jong Il, Brilliant Commander of Songun" on Feb. 2 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The bulletin carried articles titled "Kim Jong Il, perfect statesman and great master of leadership", "Korean People's faith in socialism", etc.
					
					 The bulletin in its articles noted with high appreciation that Kim Jong Il has turned socialist Korea into an invincible fortress while foiling the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK with his original Songun politics by inheriting President Kim Il Sung's Songun idea and cause.
					
					 The bulletin spoke in high praises of the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il that it gives a powerful impetus to accomplishing the cause of independence against imperialism and it serves as an example of good politics to be followed by all countries and nations in the world today when the imperialists' strong-arm policy has become evermore undisguised.
					
					 Introducing the Korean people who have turned out in the general offensive to bring about a turning-point in the socialist construction, it stressed that the world would surely see the DPRK which has turned into a great prosperous and powerful nation before long.

articles.title: Brazilian Preparatory Committee Inaugurated
articles.content:
Brazilian Preparatory Committee Inaugurated
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian preparatory committee to commemorate the Day of the Sun and February 16 was formed on Feb. 2.
					 The general secretary of the October 8 Revolutionary Movement of Brazil was elected chairman of the preparatory committee at the inaugural ceremony.
					
					 The preparatory committee set the period from February 2 to April 15 as a commemoration and celebration period and decided to organize colorful political and cultural events during the period.

articles.title: Greatest Holiday of DPRK Observed in Different Countries
articles.content:
Greatest Holiday of DPRK Observed in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Poland, a meeting and a photo exhibition in Guinea and a lecture in South Africa on Jan. 31 and Feb. 1 in celebration of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					Displayed in the venues of the functions were works of Kim Jong Il and books and photos introducing the Korean people in the efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 Artur Lepecki, chairman of the Radom Branch of the Poland-Korea Association, in his speech said that celebrating the birthday of Kim Jong Il as a holiday common to humankind is an expression of the progressive people's boundless respect and reverence for him and their high appreciation of the great exploits performed by him in the cause of independence against imperialism.
					
					 Saying that the Korean people have turned out in the general advance full of firm determination, faith and optimism to fling open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation at any cost in 2012 marking the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, true to the Songun leadership pursued by Kim Jong Il, he expressed his firm belief that the Korean people will surely win.
					
					 Malik Souma, director general of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea, in a speech said that he is recollecting the personality of Kim Jong Il as a great man who is fully supported not only by the Korean people but the world progressive people for his extraordinary political ability and noble traits, on the occasion of the significant February holiday.
					
					Bonakele Majuba, secretary of the Mpumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party, at the lecture stressed that the Korean people are sure to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation in the near future thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Guinea
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Guinea
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Songun Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner for Our Revolution" was brought out in booklet by a publishing house of Guinea.
					 The work, published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun politics, the Songun revolutionary line of the Workers' Party of Korea, is a powerful political mode of the present era which is an inheritance and development of President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of attaching importance to the army, and a scientific revolutionary line and political mode most correctly reflecting the requirements of the era and the revolution. The work also expounds the validity and advantages of the Songun politics and its great vitality.
					
					 The book-releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on Feb. 2.

articles.title: Statement of DPRK Committee for Peaceful Reunification of Korea Supported
articles.content:
Statement of DPRK Committee for Peaceful Reunification of Korea Supported
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The Czech, Moravian, Silesian Trade Unions' Association of the Czech Republic expressed support for the statement issued by the DPRK Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea.
					 The association in its statement released on Feb. 3 noted that the situation on the Korean Peninsula grew tenser and the inter-Korean relations inched close to the brink of a war due to the south Korean conservative forces' moves for confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 Referring to the fact that the said forces are not giving up their moves to provoke the DPRK, the statement asserted that this goes to clearly prove that the U.S. imperialists and the conservative Lee Myung Bak group are chieftains destroying peace and security on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It urged the south Korean "government" to immediately stop the anti-DPRK confrontational moves and opt for reconciliation and unity of the nation if it wants a peace on the Korean Peninsula, demanding the U.S. put an end to its hostile policy toward the DPRK and withdraw its aggression armed forces as well as nuclear weapons from south Korea as early as possible.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno el Complejo de Maquinaria de Rakwon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno el Complejo de Maquinaria de Rakwon
Pyongyang, 9 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dirigio sobre el terreno el Complejo de Maquinaria de Rakwon.
					Al recorrer los procesos de produccion de la fabrica de separador de oxigeno, el Dirigente hizo detallado conocimiento del estado de reconstruccion tecnica y de  produccion.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho de que los obreros de esta fabrica, con ferviente entusiasmo patriotico de contribuir a la construccion de gran potencia prospera, aceleran con impetu muy elevado la produccion y, sobre todo, realizan de modo activo los  preparativos para terminar en un corto plazo la produccion del separador de oxigeno de gran tamano, necesario al proceso de amoniaco a traves de la gasificacion que se construye nuevamente en el Complejo de Abonos de Hungnam.
					
					El Dirigente discutio detalladamente en el mismo lugar las medidas con los funcionarios del complejo y la fabrica, y,  a base de eso, dilucido el rumbo y los medios para fabricar exitosamente la fabricacion del separador.
					
					Senalo que para terminar con rapidez la produccion de separador, los Complejos de Maquinaria de Pukjung y de Ryongsong y otras empresas correspondientes deben suministrar primordialmente los encargados articulos de produccion en cooperacion.
					
					Al subrayar que el Complejo de Maquinaria de Rakwon debe fabricar mucho diversas maquinas inclusive el separador de oxigeno y elevar su calidad, presento las tareas que se presentan ante el Complejo.
					
					Dijo que a fin de producir la gran cantidad de las maquinarias modernas que convienen a la demanda de la epoca de la industria informatica es preciso seguir concentrando las fuerzas en la transformacion tecnica basada en las tecnologias de punta y realizar la modernizacion y cientifizacion de los procesos productivos.
					
					Recalco que en la etapa actual el complejo debe concentrar todas las fuerzas en la produccion del separador de oxigeno de gran tamano, fabricar excavadoras y otras maquinas de buena calidad para enviarlas a los lugares de construccion de capital, el de construccion de la central de Huichon y otras ramas de la economia nacional.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il expreso la esperanza y la conviccion de que los obreros de Rakwon que en cada  decada de la revolucion, desde el periodo de la guerra hasta hoy, defendieron en la  delantera  al partido y el lider, produciran un gran salto en la produccion de maquinaria con aquel espiritu e impetu y asi manifestaran de manera continua y plena el impetu heroico de la clase obrera de Corea.
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario responsable del comite del PTC en la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, Kim Phyong Hae, el secretario del CC del PTC Kim Ki Nam y los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Pak Nam Gi y Jang Song Thaek.

articles.title: Todos coreanos eligen a Kim Jong Il como candidato al diputado de APS
articles.content:
Todos coreanos eligen a Kim Jong Il como candidato al diputado de APS
Pyongyang, 9 de febrero (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar en todas las circunscripciones de todo el pais los colegios electorales para elegir los candidatos a los diputados a la XII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					 En las ocasiones los electores eligieron al Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, como candidato al diputado a la XII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC.
					
					En las reuniones los informantes y los oradores elogiaron altamente las inmortales hazanas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y senalaron que poner a este  en la delantera de la revolucion constituye la maxima felicidad y gloria de la patria y la nacion coreana.
					
					En  los actos de las respectivas circunscripciones  electorales propusieron con respeto elegir al Dirigente como candidato al diputado a la XII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC y todos los participantes expresaron su  entero apoyo y aprobacion al respecto.
					
					En los actos fueron declarados solemnemente que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il fue elegido como candidato al diputado a la XII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC en las respectivas circunscripciones electorales.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena el insolito movimiento militar de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena el insolito movimiento militar de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 9 de febrero (ATCC) --Hace poco, las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes en el Sur de Corea desarrollaron de manera frenetica el ejercicio de tiro aereo movilizando los helicopteros "Apache" en su campo de tiro en la ciudad de Phochon de la provincia de Kyonggi.
					Esto deviene el acto criminal de llevar mas al extremo la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana que llega al borde de la  guerra.
					
					Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 9 y continua:
					
					Ahora, debido a las imprudentes maniobras de enfrentamiento y guerra de los titeres surcoreanos cautivados por la ambicion de agresion a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana esta en el estado muy tenso de estallar en cualquier momento la guerra.
					
					Lo mas peligroso es que desde los primeros dias de enero las fuerzas belicistas norteamericanas armaron alborotos militares contra la RPDC adhiriendose a tales maniobras de los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					 Es indiscutible el que tal movimiento militar de las fuerzas belicosas norteamericanas y surcoreanas deviene el acto provocativo para destruir la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana puesta en el estado inestable y llegar al extremo el peligro de la guerra nuclear.
					
					En estos dias los belicistas norteamericanos hablan abiertamente del "uso de la fuerza militar" contra la RPDC. Coincidiendo en tiempo con eso,  las tropas agresoras norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea y  los titeres surcoreanos desarrollan casi diariamente los freneticos ejercicios de guerra, lo cual  es, sin excepcion, una guerra preliminar para  revisar y perfeccionar la capacidad de ejecucion de las ya trazadas piezas de guerra agresiva a la RPDC y el intento militar para darle en cualquier momento a esta el ataque preventivo.
					
					 Tales maniobras de EE.UU. por la preparacion de la provocacion de la nueva guerra someten al pueblo coreano a elevar mas la vigilancia revolucionaria y poseer la poderosa fuerza disuasiva para hacerle frente.
					
					 El pueblo coreano desea la paz, pero no teme jamas la guerra.
					
					 Si las fuerzas belicistas yanquis persiguen por fin  la guerra el ejercito y pueblo de Corea asestaran el golpe demoledor a los agresores empleando  todas las fuerzas y la potencia espiritual consolidadas con el poderio del Songun (priorizacion militar).  
					
					Las fuerzas belicistas norteamericanas deben darse clara cuenta de la voluntad del pueblo coreano y abandonar sus imprudentes maniobras militares.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena nombramiento de Hyon In Thaek
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena nombramiento de Hyon In Thaek
Pyongyang, 9 de febrero (ATCC) -- En relacion con que tendra lugar el dia 9 en la Asamblea Nacional del Sur de Corea la "audiencia" sobre  Hyon In Thaek, designado como ministro de "Reunificacion" por Lee Myung Bak, el periodico Minju Joson inserto la vispera un comentario  individual que senala en particular:
					Si Hyon, perverso maniaco de enfrentamiento con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y traidor y vendepatria  proyanqui, asume el cargo del ministro de "Reunificacion", se creara la inesperada situacion en las relaciones intercoreanas completamente cerradas.
					
					Ahora, el ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC determinan contar sin falta los crimenes de Hyon que al hacerse  el lacayo de Lee actua como la brigada de choque en la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					Por tanto, si ese tipejo toma el puesto del ministro de "Reunificacion", las relaciones entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea se empeoraran mas que hoy y en fin de cuentas seran totalmente fracasadas.
					
					A traves del nombramiento de Hyon, inventor de la teoria de la "desnuclearizacion, apertura y 3000 dolares" y maniaco de la confrontacion anti-RPDC, como ministro de "Reunificacion", Lee puso al desnudo que son puramente mentiras sus palabras sobre el "respeto" a las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur y persigue invariablemente la politica de confrontacion fratricida.
					
					Si se crea la situacion inesperada en las relaciones Norte-Sur, la responsabilidad recaera enteramente sobre el traidor Lee.
